A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It didn’t need character development in the way a trilogy needs. They were destined to die so the back story isn’t needed as much. The comedy is light not full Disney like XII and XIII. The feel is dark like empire strikes back\, it answered a lot of questions people had and filled plot holes the original movies left. Though we don’t know the characters we get the feel of what they are fighting for through self sacrifice. Even the droid captures the emotions of sacrifice for the greater good. The tie backs and respect for the original movie captured the magic of the original films. The new movies didn’t do any of that. Luke should have been wiser in this film it was like Mark Hamill was playing himself.
